document.discussion_title: Intertek Group plc (ITRK) Rating Reiterated by BNP Paribas
document.topic_text: Tweet Intertek Group plc (LON:ITRK) ‘s stock had its “neutral” rating reissued by equities research analysts at BNP Paribas in a research report issued on Monday. They currently have a GBX 3,500 ($45.07) target price on the stock. BNP Paribas’ price objective would indicate a potential downside of 3.42% from the stock’s previous close. In related news, insider Leigh,Edward purchased 976 shares of Intertek Group plc stock in a transaction on Wednesday, May 25th. The stock was purchased at an average cost of GBX 3,112 ($40.07) per share, with a total value of £30,373.12 ($39,110.38). Several other research analysts have also weighed in on the stock. Credit Suisse Group AG reiterated a “neutral” rating and issued a GBX 3,400 ($43.78) price objective on shares of Intertek Group plc in a research note on Monday, August 8th. HSBC reiterated a “reduce” rating and issued a GBX 3,010 ($38.76) price objective on shares of Intertek Group plc in a research note on Monday, August 8th. Kepler Capital Markets upped their price objective on shares of Intertek Group plc from GBX 3,410 ($43.91) to GBX 3,580 ($46.10) and gave the company a “hold” rating in a research note on Tuesday, August 2nd. Numis Securities Ltd lowered shares of Intertek Group plc to a “reduce” rating and upped their price objective for the company from GBX 2,800 ($36.05) to GBX 3,100 ($39.92) in a research note on Tuesday, August 2nd. Finally, Societe Generale lowered shares of Intertek Group plc to a “sell” rating and upped their price objective for the company from GBX 3,230 ($41.59) to GBX 3,300 ($42.49) in a research note on Tuesday, August 2nd. Seven investment analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, eleven have issued a hold rating and one has given a buy rating to the company. The stock presently has a consensus rating of “Hold” and an average price target of GBX 3,200.12 ($41.21). //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/intertek-group-plc-itrk-rating-reiterated-by-bnp-paribas-2/ Shares of Intertek Group plc ( LON:ITRK ) opened at 3642.00 on Monday. Intertek Group plc has a 1-year low of GBX 2,296.00 and a 1-year high of GBX 3,706.00. The stock’s market cap is GBX 5.86 billion. The company’s 50-day moving average is GBX 3,573.66 and its 200 day moving average is GBX 3,240.55. The business also recently declared a dividend, which will be paid on Friday, October 14th. Shareholders of record on Thursday, September 29th will be issued a GBX 19.40 ($0.25) dividend. This represents a yield of 0.55%. The ex-dividend date of this dividend is Thursday, September 29th. Receive News & Ratings for Intertek Group plc Intertek Group plc
